rows.label: qev015602_MSG0001
rows.name: Oh! You did it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0002
rows.name:
I'm pretty sure this is everything I need...
We should be ready to go, I think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0003
rows.name:
Hear that, L? It's finally time to put the final touches
on your miracle machine, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0004
rows.name:
And we trust you to do just that, friend.
Once complete, this device will be a revolution in
revolutionary inventions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0005
rows.name:
It will be terribly useful to the BLADEs, not to mention a
first-rate crowd puller for our humble shop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0006
rows.name:
Oh wow. I guess I'll do my best, okay?
Let me go go make the finishing touches now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0007
rows.name: It's finished, L. Hopefully it's all right, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0008
rows.name:
Ah, wonderful! We've just finished lining up our
tempting throng of tantalizing trinkets.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0009
rows.name:
Our shop is moments away from its grandiose opening.
Moments, we tell you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0010
rows.name:
And what do you think, friend?
Will our store be the new talk of the tower?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev015602_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask L for details about their mystery device.

rows.label: qev015602_JNK0020
rows.name: Doubt

rows.label: qev015602_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask L what it is he's selling, exactly.

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0011
rows.name: Ah, how rude of us! We failed to explain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0012
rows.name:
Treasures, my friend! Each with a story more fantastical
than the last! Were we to tell them all, we'd be here
until the dawn's early light.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0013
rows.name:
However, we would be most pleased to tell you about
them in great detail when you come to shop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0014
rows.name:
For now, allow us to introduce the device that Giogion
just completed...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0015
rows.name:
This mother of all inventions opens additional
augment slots in your weapons and armor,
both with ground gear and Skells as well![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0016
rows.name:
With one simple purchase, BLADEs can now elevate
their equipment to new and lofty heights![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0017
rows.name:
But they say a picture is worth a thousand worms,
so by way of demonstration, we will give you this
attack assault rifle. Try giving it a new augment slot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0018
rows.name:
I'm ready pretty much anytime, you know?
Let's open up some slots, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0019
rows.name:
And thus new slots for augments are born in otherwise
unremarkable equipment, all thanks to our handy new
invention.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0020
rows.name:
It's certain to become a necessity for all self-respecting
BLADEs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0021
rows.name:
And when they come by to avail themselves of this
service, they'll be unable to pass up the rest of our
fantastical collection![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev015602_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell L that it sounds like a solid plan.

rows.label: qev015602_JNK0040
rows.name: Snicker

rows.label: qev015602_SEL0041
rows.name:
Point out that you don't think L's
"fantastical collection" will sell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0022
rows.name:
Ah, most excellent! You have our thanks.
We are terribly eager to share these peerless works
with all the citizens of New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0023
rows.name:
We had hoped that you, of all people, would see the
value in our collection of priceless works.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0024
rows.name:
But no matter! We'll not rest in peace until the lot of
them has been sold to happy buyers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0025
rows.name: Well, I think your shop will be a huge success, L![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0026
rows.name:
So maybe I can stay on to help? You'll need someone
to maintain your super machine after all, won't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0027
rows.name:
We would be delighted! As they said on Earth,
only the very finest party in a storm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0028
rows.name:
Well, we are officially open for business.
And it was you who made the grand opening possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015602_MSG0029
rows.name:
We hope you will accept this as thanks, and also
be sure to frequent our shop. After all, a friend who
spends is a friend in need![ST:wait ]
